name: SEO Optimizer
shortDescription: Optimize your content for search engines with titles, meta descriptions, and keywords.
longDescription: The SEO Optimizer helps you optimize any content for search engine visibility. Generate compelling meta titles, descriptions, and keyword strategies that improve your rankings and drive organic traffic.

seoMeta.title: Free AI SEO Optimizer | Generate Meta Titles & Descriptions
seoMeta.description: Optimize your content for search engines with AI-generated meta titles, descriptions, and keywords using our free SEO Optimizer.

landingContent.heroTagline: Optimize Your Content for Search Engines
landingContent.heroSubtitle: Generate compelling meta titles, descriptions, and keyword strategies that improve rankings and drive organic traffic.
landingContent.formula: [PRIMARY KEYWORD] + [COMPELLING TITLE] + [BENEFIT-DRIVEN META] + [NATURAL INTEGRATION] = SEO-Optimized Content
tips: Front-load keywords in titles - put the most important terms in the first 50 characters
Write for clicks, not just ranking - a higher CTR can improve rankings over time
Include a CTA in meta descriptions - tell searchers what they'll get or learn
Match search intent - understand if searchers want to learn, buy, or find something specific

examples.title: Blog Post SEO
examples.content:
Title: 'How to Start a Podcast in 2024: Complete Beginner's Guide' (60 chars)
Meta: 'Learn how to start a podcast from scratch. Step-by-step guide covering equipment, hosting, and launch strategy. Start your show today.' (155 chars)

examples.title: Service Page SEO
examples.content:
Title: 'Executive Coaching for Tech Leaders | [Brand Name]' (52 chars)
Meta: 'Executive coaching designed for tech leaders. 1:1 programs that help CTOs and VPs lead with confidence. Book your discovery call today.' (148 chars)

examples.title: Product Page SEO
examples.content:
Title: 'Podcast Guest Booking System | Automated Outreach Tool' (58 chars)
Meta: 'Book 10x more podcast interviews with our automated outreach system. Templates, tracking, and follow-ups built in. Try free for 14 days.' (150 chars)

howItWorks.title: Enter Your Content
howItWorks.description: Paste your page content or topic.

features.title: Character Counts
features.description: Ensures proper length for search display.

faq.question: How long should title tags be?
faq.answer: 50-60 characters to avoid truncation in search results. Front-load your main keyword.

faq.question: What makes a good meta description?
faq.answer: 150-160 characters, includes main keyword, has a clear value proposition, and ends with a call to action.

faq.question: How many keywords should I target?
faq.answer: One primary keyword and 2-3 secondary keywords per page. Focus on relevance over quantity.

faq.question: Does this replace an SEO tool?
faq.answer: It complements SEO tools by helping with on-page optimization. Use alongside tools like Ahrefs or Semrush for full SEO strategy.
